name: Water Bug
description:
Our sezai was sent to a planet in outer space due to the push of water resources to Earth. If there is not enough water supply, the last survivors will die. But the cunning aliens realize that a stranger has entered their world.

w==creat a wall

s== break stone 

e == pick the water
